name: Monkey Spin Run
description:
Run and Jump! Monkey Spin Run is a Jumping action game.
Touch anywhere to jump and avoid obstacles in your adventure
Collect as many coins as possible to reach the high score.
Simple game rule but it's surprisingly challenging.
Easy to Play - Free for All
Don't forget to invite your friends and share with them your high score and achievements!

You know your kids aren't the only one's who will love it! ;)
